Text: Despite the English text above, the app is in Greek!

its a very weird old school teaching program. i think its designed to put on a projector in a class room. but the last commenter was right it is entirely in greek except for the names of the makers of the program. im going to try and see if there is a language switching option hidden in the greek mess lol. but other than that program works great, is a pretty old program from design standpoint but great torrent nonetheless
